author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يا مَحْبُوبِي وَرَجائِي بِأَنْ تَحْفَظَ عَبْدَكَ الَّذِيْ تَوَجَّهَ إِلَيْكَ مِنْ سِهامِ إِشَاراتِ المُنْكرِينَ وَرِماحِ دَلالاتِ المُعْرِضِينَ، ثُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ خالِصًا لِنَفْسِكَ وَناطِقًا بِذِكْرِكَ وَمُتَوَجِّهًا إِلى كَعْبَةِ أَمْرِكَ وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الَّذِيْ ما خَيَّبْتَ الآمِلِينَ عَنْ بابِ رَحْمَتِكَ وَما مَنَعْتَ القاصِدِينَ عَنْ سَاحَةِ فَضْلِكَ لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ المُقْتَدِرُ المُتَعالِ المُهَيْمِنُ العَزِيزُ المُتَكَبِّرُ المُخْتَارُ.
translation: Shield, I pray Thee, O my Beloved, my heart’s Desire, Thy servant who hath sought Thy face, from the darts of them that have denied Thee and from the shafts of such as have repudiated Thy Truth. Cause him, then, to be wholly devoted to Thee, to declare Thy name, and to fix his gaze upon the sanctuary of Thy Revelation. Thou art, in truth, He Who, at no time, hath turned away those who have set their hopes in Thee from the door of Thy mercy, nor prevented such as have sought Thee from attaining the court of Thy grace. No God is there but Thee, the Most Powerful, the All-Highest, the Help in Peril, the All-Glorious, the All-Compelling, the Unconditioned.
